title: Van der Poel vs. Van Aert: A Data-Driven Primer on the Greatest Rivalry in Pro Cycling
content:
Cyclocross and classics crushers Van Aert and Van der Poel face off again Sunday at CX worlds. But is it still fair to compare the decade-long foes?

Read the full article at Van der Poel vs. Van Aert: A Data-Driven Primer on the Greatest Rivalry in Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
